extendedInfo.description: The Linksys Smart Wi-Fi mobile app allows you to manage your Linksys Smart Wi-Fi Router. The Linksys Smart Wi-Fi mobile app was previously named "Cisco Connect Cloud". Home networking just got a lot more fun and easily accessible. With Linksys Smart Wi-Fi you can get access into your home network from anywhere at any time. Plus, continue to get new apps and capabilities that will optimize your connected experiences. From your Linksys Smart Wi-Fi mobile app easily tap into your home network to check the connection status of your devices, give a guest access to the Internet, or block your child from accessing social networking sites when they should be doing homework. You can even prioritize what devices on your network get priority bandwidth to reduce lag times and buffering. You no longer have to be tethered to your desk at home to get visibility into your home network. Get the freedom to access and control your connected life on the go.  Key Features: â¨â¨Remote Access â Access and manage your network on the go using your Linksys Smart Wi-Fi account. Guest Access â Easily give your friends and family Internet access on your separate guest network. Simply tap on your Linksys Smart Wi-Fi app to get and share your guest network password. Media Prioritization - Prioritize which devices on your network get the most bandwidth for less lag time and buffering.Parental Controls - Create a safe Internet experience for your kids, even on-the-go. From your mobile phone or tablet, restrict access to specific web sites or block specific devices from accessing the Internet. Linksys Smart Wi-Fi is available with Linksys EA Smart Wi-Fi Routers. To view the full list of supported routers, click here: http://home.cisco.com/mobile/apps/supportedTo access Linksys Smart Wi-Fi, you must first create a secure user account (www.linksyssmartwifi.com) and then simply login to that account, either at home, or from anywhere you have Internet access.System Requirements: â¨* This product will only work with a Linksys Smart Wi-Fi Router. To view the full list of supported routers, click here: http://home.cisco.com/mobile/apps/supportedâ¨* Android 2.2 and greaterCopyright and Trademark notice: 2013 Cisco and/or its affiliates. All rights reserved.  Cisco, the Cisco logo, Linksys Smart Wi-Fi and Cisco Connect are trademarks or registered trademarks of Cisco and/or its affiliates in the US and/or certain other countries. Privacy Policy http://www.cisco.com/web/siteassets/legal/privacy.htmlFor email support, contact our Support Team at ccp-mobile-support@cisco.com

reviews.title: Nice and useful app
reviews.comment: Very nicely designed and built app. Comes in very handy to set up your router through your phone. Very convenient.
reviews.author: Allan Leeman

reviews.title: love the app
reviews.comment: love it. simple to use on blocking usage for specific units. great to keep an eye on your connection.  running it on my Ipad3 and my samsung note II
reviews.author: Jesus Montalvo

reviews.title: Love the application
reviews.comment: Works good on my S3, kudos to developers.  As an improvement, I would suggest the ability to wake up machines (using WOL) remotely. I am sure many people would love this feature!
reviews.author: Viorel Tamas

reviews.title: Should be five stars except
reviews.comment: I can\'t edit the router wan and lan information. I can\'t set it to a static IP address. And now I can\'t access the router from the Web page because my browser isn\'t supported.   You just made me look like a fool in front of a client. I trusted you guys.   Fix it. I WANT to give it a 5 star.
reviews.author: Lee Allen

reviews.title: Love this app
reviews.comment: I use it on my Samsung Galaxy Nexus, no problems.  ,
reviews.author: Daniel Evanowski

reviews.title: Cant use
reviews.comment: Would be awesome if i could log in. But just keeps telling me the account info im trying to log in with is invalid.....
reviews.author: Marc Dains

reviews.title: I use this app all the time...
reviews.comment: I know that beggars can\'t be choosers, but I think that it does everything so well that I am more than confident that everyone that uses it would pay money to have it. That is because there are so many other features that are missing that one is still left wanting. At, I know I am, and while maybe this the case only for the Android version, like with other programs that are available in a free or paid version, there surely can be a way to improve on something that is already good. Thanks CISCO!
reviews.author: Max Poggio

reviews.title: Worthless
reviews.comment: Fails to connect most of the time. When it did connect it did not last long enough to use it.
reviews.author: Gene Garza

reviews.title: Can\'t remove devices, EVER!
reviews.comment: Once a device has been on your network, it is ALWAYS listed as a device, and can NEVER be removed! Lots of old offline devices cluttering up the device list forever... Other than that it\'s a great app, would be 5 stars!
reviews.author: d fain

reviews.title: Good start
reviews.comment: I second the WOL idea below from Tamas! That would be a real cool and easy solution. I would give you 6 stars for that.
reviews.author: Robert Wheat

reviews.title: Useless!!
reviews.comment: Usless app doesn\'t apply to cisco value and they should have better app. False showing online devices, its show some devices as on line while they are not! Can\'t change devices name or icon
reviews.author: ashraf aboubakr

reviews.title: Works fine if you\'re not an idiot
reviews.comment: All the complaints on here seem to be a user error, not the app.  And Lee Allen, your browser wasn\'t supported and its the apps fault?  Really?  You could of used another browser...or learn basic networking skills before you make yourself look like a dumbass! And Eileen, why do you rate the app 1 star because you forgot your password?  Jeeez some people are soooo stupid.
reviews.author: Brady Nelson

reviews.title: Unable to log in
reviews.comment: not sure why I can\'t signed in I even tried all my email accounts but none worked. will be great if some one can tell me what I\'m doing wrong. my phone is Motorola xt910. will reconsider the rating later if successfully log in.  Why i can\'t log in.............This product will only work with a Linksys Smart Wi-Fi Router. Thank u Linksys
reviews.author: Olu Adebiyi

reviews.title: Top notch
reviews.comment: 5 stars on parental control
reviews.author: herbert concuan

reviews.title: Great app but would love to see more.
reviews.comment: this app works great on my GS 3 I would love to have a few new options. First i use roku boxes to access netflix but i have 2 boxes one that i need to do parental controls on and I don\'t have to option to do that cause on the app it puts both boxes under the same title where you click on it and it shows the 2 ip addresses. I want them split up. 2 I want the option remotely to reboot router and or cut off users from using the internet remotely. those are my thoughts. e-mail me if i can explain any further.
reviews.author: Michael Schumacher

reviews.title: Need to know
reviews.comment: This is an amazing app!  To agree with what is apparently the other two admins, a wake feature would be handy.  Otherwise it is 100% problem free.  The lack is on the user end.  Not to be conceited but networking isn\'t for everyone.  If you don\'t fully understand what you are doing, you can do more harm than good.  I am a network engineer.  When my car needs work, I take it to the shop because I don\'t know how.  Again, to IT admins, app does EXACTLY what it says.  HTC One here.
reviews.author: Dante Jackson

reviews.title: Wow
reviews.comment: After the dumb update doesnt even work on my LG optimus 3D awesome
reviews.author: Reyes Mitchell

reviews.comment: I bought EA6300 thinking I can do parental control stating specific time wherever and whenever i want but unfortunately In the android platform the smartwifi do NOT have specific time for parental control
reviews.author: Peter Wong

reviews.title: HTC one s
reviews.comment: Works good. Great if app was setup the same way as the pc  desktop version
reviews.author: John Tarantino

reviews.title: Excellent Update!
reviews.comment: The latest update is fast smooth and adds the functionality I expected from the beginning. Well done!
reviews.author: Brian Kennedy
